name: Scaling
Description: Adjusting resources dynamically to meet demand.

name: V-Scale
Description: Increasing resources of an existing instance (CPU, RAM).

name: H-Scale
Description: Adding/removing instances to handle load changes.

name: L-Shed
Description: Dropping non-critical requests to maintain service quality.

name: Cache
Description: Temporarily storing data for faster retrieval.

name: SW Cache
Description: Caching implemented in software (e.g., Redis, Memcached).

name: HTTP Cache
Description: Caching HTTP responses for faster delivery.

name: Migrate
Description: Moving workloads between nodes or environments.

name: Co-loc
Description: Placing related services on the same node for efficiency.

name: Queueing
Description: Managing request queues to optimize processing.

name: Net Topo
Description: Adjusting network structure to optimize routing.

name: Traffic
Description: Directing network traffic based on policies.
